name: New Year's Eve Celebrations at Harbourfront Centre
description:
Glide into the new year on the rink while DJ Smartiez spins the tunes! Known for experimenting with fresh mixes and a high-energy mix of top chart-smashing hits, he's sure to keep the energy up.

Dance along to this year's headliner, Lu Kala, bringing a fiery-voiced sound to our Concert Stage, with opening sets by cootie catcher, offering playful indie-electronic vibes, and Kalisway, known for electrifying, feel-good tracks that blend classic groove with modern edge. KIMIWVN's DJ set will follow the midnight countdown and keep the celebration going after midnight with a dance party.

Enjoy tasty bites from local vendors at our Community Square, join in on one last scavenger hunt through the Winter Maze and countdown to midnight with the City of Toronto's spectacular 10-minute fireworks display, synchronized to music for a stunning high-altitude light show over the lake.

name: New Year's Eve Bash with Devo Brown and DJ Clymaxxx
description:
Ring in 2026 with the hosts of Set It OFF on 92.5 KiSS Radio! 

They'll be bringing a mix of today's biggest hits and throwback favourites to the Distillery Winter Village's, all-ages, outdoor New Year's Eve Bash, capped off with a spectacular fireworks show at midnight.

name: Toronto Nightclubs New Year's Eve Events 2026
description: Celebrate the New Year at Toronto's hottest New Year's eve parties, club crawls and roll into 2026 in style.

name: The Last Laugh: New Year's Eve Comedy Showcase
description:
Laugh your way into 2026!

Come watch Toronto's darkest, silliest, goofiest, and most unhinged professional comedians tell their best jokes that will have you laugh all night.

This show features performances by nationally touring comics featured on Netflix, Just For Laughs, Crave, Prime Video, CBC Radio and more.

Tell your friends, girlfriend, boyfriend, partner, dog walker and your mother too, while tickets last.

name: Gone Country! New Year's Eve at Left Field Brewery
description:
Ring in the new year with us! 

Enjoy a classic country legion hall dance party hosted by Saddle Up! featuring The Ramblin' Fever Band.

Sample Wild West-inspired food and drink specials, elevate your look at our buckaroo-bedazzling station before hitting the photo booth and dance the night away to classic country hits (think Dolly, Willie and Shania) 

It's going to be a boot-scootin' bash you don't want to miss!

name: Tranzac New Years Eve
description: Party with Eucalyptus, Alex "Bad Baby" Lukashevsky and Cocoa Corner, Bag, DJs Raf Reza and trustfall.

name: New Year's Eve
description:
Ring in the New Year with a festive countdown to 2026 along Toronto's stunning waterfront.

Enjoy the celebration with pop-up performances, lively entertainment and a spectacular 10-minute midnight fireworks display lighting up the city skyline and visible from anywhere with a view of Toronto's inner harbour and live on YouTube.

Please note there are no fireworks at City Hall or Nathan Phillips Square.
